title: unlocked a skin for nocturne and it doesn't show up at all
body: paid for a couple keys and such and unlocked a nocturne skin and I had plenty of essence to unlock it and once unlocked it said added to my loot and it has never shown up. can i get some rp to replace that it was a 975 skin or is there some other way to fix this?

replies.body: Is the impacted account the one you're posting from? I don't see any history here of the account having a Nocturne shard.  When was it?  I do see that you used 675 Orange Essences to unlock Death Blossom Kha'Zix, though.  Let me know!
